entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
